question_text: If the magnification produced by a lens is +2 then the image is:
option_1_text: erect, virtual and smaller than the object.
option_2_text: inverted, real and smaller than the object.
option_3_text: erect, virtual and larger than the object.
option_4_text: inverted, real and larger than the object.

question_text: In which one of the following years was the first telegraphic connection established between Europe and India?
Which one of the following statements with regard to the Election Commission is not correct?
option_1_text: It conducts elections to the office of the Vice President of India.
option_2_text: An Election Commissioner can be removed from his office without the recommendation of the Chief Election Commissioner
option_3_text: Election Commissioners are appointed by the President of India.
option_4_text: Governor of a State is constitutionally bound to provide support staff to the Election Commission, if required.

question_text: According to the Constitution of India, which one of the following statements is not correct?
option_1_text: The executive powers of the Union shall be vested in the President of India.
option_2_text: Parliament, by law, can confer functions on authorities other than the President of India.
option_3_text: The President of India is elected by an electoral college consisting of all Members of Parliament and all Members of all State Legislatures.
option_4_text: A person, having held office as the President, shall be eligible for election to that office for the second term.

question_text: Which one of the following Articles of the Constitution of India requires the Prime Minister of India to furnish information related to decisions of the Council of Ministers to the President of India?
Which one of the following statements is not correct?
option_1_text: All executive actions of the Government of India are taken in the name of the President of India
option_2_text: The President of India appoints a person as Attorney General of India provided she/he is qualified to be a Judge of the Supreme Court or a High Court.
option_3_text: The total number of Ministers in the Council of Ministers cannot exceed ten percent of the total number of members of the House of People.
option_4_text: The President of India is bound to act as per the advice tendered by the Council of Ministers.
